description:
Shoot the aliens and save the humans.

Alien Shooter is a classic arcade shooter game that you can play online. Have fun with this popular shooting game!

Game features

  • Suitable for all ages
  • Easy to play
  • Exciting levels
  • Good quality of sound and graphics.

How to play

Alien Shooter is a free online game. Just point and shoot. It's a rather simple game, but it does include some elements of cool strategy. You'll do well to upgrade your weapon in the beginning because you'll want to make sure you have a powerful gun! Take control of a powerful armor that is armed with weapons and go on epic adventures in various missions; pass through simple tasks; eliminate hordes of attacking enemies; and complete the main plot of this game to save the humans.

Game controls

Desktop

Use the right click button to shoot the aliens.

Mobile

Tap on the screen to shoot the aliens.

Controls and indicators

Upper left side of the screen has the pause button

The scores and  levels are shown in the upper middle of the screen.
